rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg001
rows.name:
Hey Saika, Zeke has such
terrible luck, doesn't he?

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg002
rows.name:
It must be tough being his partner,
isn't it?

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg003
rows.name:
You got that right.
The Prince's bad luck
is beyond ridiculous.

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg004
rows.name:
If they had a bad luck championship
for all of Alst, he'd win
first place by.

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg005
rows.name:
Just from what I've witnessed,
he's fallen from cliffs and almost
been flattened by rolling boulders.

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg006
rows.name:
He also fell into the Cloud Sea once,
didn't he?

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg007
rows.name: Hah, that's just the tip of the iceberg.

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg008
rows.name:
One time at the harbor, he got chomped
on by a Divine Beast ship and another
time got smacked by one's tail.

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg018
rows.name:
Once he got caught in a sudden
snowstorm, got lost, and found himself
surrounded by a hundred Ignas!

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg009
rows.name: I could go on all day with these stories.

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg010
rows.name: How should I put this...

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg011
rows.name:
Frankly, I'm impressed you're both
still alive.

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg012
rows.name:
Truly, well done...
Or should I say, my condolences?

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg013
rows.name: Kagutsuchi, that joke went too far.

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg014
rows.name:
But because of all that,
I really can't take my eyes off him.
He's such a handful of a prince.

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg015
rows.name:
I wish you could be in my position,
having to deal with him.

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg019
rows.name: What should I say?

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg016
rows.name:
You like him, including all
those aspects, don't you?

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg017
rows.name:
You sound like a worrying mother,
you know.

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg101
rows.name:
Huh!? Why are we suddenly talking
about liking or disliking?

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg102
rows.name:
Ah, I understand now.
You're pretending to complain
while secretly fond of him.

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg103
rows.name:
Exactly, this is what they call
being "tsundere," right?

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg104
rows.name:
Don't be ridiculous!
Me, tsundere?
That's completely absurd!

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg105
rows.name: Saika, you don't need to be embarrassed.

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg106
rows.name:
As a fellow Blade, I'll be happy to
keep this just between us.

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg107
rows.name:
Indeed.
This will remain confidential.
secret just between us.

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg108
rows.name:
What are you talking about?
It's not like that at all!

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg109
rows.name:
Oh my, you look so adorable
when you're embarrassed .

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg112
rows.name: Yes, indeed...

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg110
rows.name:
Heyi! Quit with those
sympathetic smirks!

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg111
rows.name: This is all that unlucky prince's fault!!

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg201
rows.name: Oh yes, such a troublesome son he is...

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg202
rows.name: Hold on! Who are you calling his mom?!

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg203
rows.name: At least call me his "Onee-chan"!

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg204
rows.name:
Ah, what a comeback! What
impeccable comedic delivery!

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg205
rows.name:
That's right, the timing
of this comeback is crucial!

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg210
rows.name:
No, no... The real issue here
is the prince himself.

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg211
rows.name:
With someone that unlucky nearby,
anyone would worry, not just a mother.

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg212
rows.name:
He's amazing when it really matters,
but I wish he could be that reliable
all the time...

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg213
rows.name:
But if his bad luck disappeared,
he wouldn't be Zeke anymore,
would he?

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg214
rows.name:
Yes,
that is precisely Zeke-sama's identity.

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg215
rows.name: Yeah, that's true.

rows.label: kizunatalk037_msg216
rows.name: ... My prince is nothing but trouble.
